sections.heading: On-device processing
paragraphs: Color sampling happens locally. Camera previews and picked photos are only analyzed to extract color values and are not transmitted to servers.

sections.heading: Network usage
paragraphs: Network requests are limited to fetching optional supporting data such as palette names. No personal images or camera frames are uploaded.
bullets: If you prefer a fully offline experience, you can revoke network access at the system level.
You may revoke camera and photo permissions anytime from your device settings.

sections.heading: Data retention
paragraphs: Saved colors and palettes stay on your device until you delete them. Clearing the app data or uninstalling removes your saved items.
